column5: My place is very close to close to Round Top, Texas and Festival Hill. It has WIFI, Satellite TV, and comfortable rooms in a newly constructed classic farmhouse on a working farm. My place is good for couples and solo adventurers and a sitting room with a foldout sofa is available as an add on (upon request). Very close to many of the Antique Fair destinations!
column8: Cowboy Room in New Carmine Farmhouse
